name: Polygon FPS: Battle Royal
description:
This is the demo as it is from the FPS Tutorial Series Im doing on YouTube.  All content is being created on the fly during live streams and based on requests.  Its current only map is the shooting range and its almost complete.  The other map is done minus the combative targets being reworked.

Basic WASD controls with mouse.  Space to jump, Left mouse button to fire, right mouse button to go to scope mode and back.  B to use and store binoculars.  Left shift to sprint.  Left control to walk slow.

Escape while playing shows the escape menu.

More info and requests can be made on my discord channel.  

Beefalo Bart Gaming Discord Channel
